item.title: Brazilian securitization company VERT launches Private Credit Platform on the XRP Ledger
item.description: On July 24th, according to CoinDesk, the Brazilian securitization company VERT has launched a blockchain-based private credit platform on the XRP Ledger and issued the first batch of Agricultural Receivables Certificates (CRA), which is worth 7 billion Brazilian reais (approximately 1.3 billion U.S. dollars).CRA is a crucial financial instrument in the Brazilian agriculture sector, which is used to package future cash flows. This issuance was carried out on the XRPL and its compatible Ethereum EVM sidechain, enabling real-time tracking of cash flows, loan events, and repayments.

item.title: KeyCorp CEO: Willing to Provide Cryptocurrency Custody Services in Collaboration with Customers
item.description: On July 24th, as per Cointelegraph, the CEO of KeyCorp Bank stated, "Cryptocurrency is, to a certain extent, a means of storing value - as long as our clients have a need for it and wish to hold it in their wallets, we will offer our cooperation."

item.title: Crypto Market Greed Index Cools Down, Today's Fear and Greed Index at 71
item.description: On July 24th, based on alternative data, the Fear and Greed Index of cryptocurrencies today is 71 (yesterday it was 74), and the "greed" sentiment in the market has cooled down.Note: The threshold of the Fear Index is 0-100, which includes indicators such as Volatility (25%) + Market Volume (25%) + Social Media Activity (15%) + Market Surveys (15%) + Bitcoin's Dominance (10%) + Google Trends Analysis (10%).

item.title: Renzo Protocol has adopted an Ethereum reserve strategy and currently holds 1050 ETH.
item.description: On July 24th, the re-staking and yield optimization protocol Renzo Protocol has entered the ranks of protocols adopting an Ethereum reserve strategy. The protocol currently holds approximately 1050 ETH (around $3.8 million), ranking 39th among institutional holdings that adopt an Ethereum reserve strategy.This data has been verified by Renzo's official X account, which further stated: "Renzo is continuously injecting more Ethereum into the reserve."

item.title: Analyst: Bitcoin Whales Transfer Large Amounts, Uptrend May Slow Down but Is Not Over
item.description: On July 24th, CryptoQuant analyst Axel Adler Jr. posted that with Bitcoin's price fluctuating between $106,000 and $118,000, an abnormally high monthly Coin Days Destroyed (CDD) and an annual CDD ratio (0.25) emerged in the current market. This value is close to the historical high in 2014 and the level during the 2019 pullback.This shows that long-term holders - investors who have not moved their Bitcoin for several years - are massively transferring their holdings to the market. Such a surge in CDD typically means that experienced players are actively distributing their chips.Meanwhile, institutional fund demand and Bitcoin ETF inflows remain at high levels. Therefore, this round of chip distribution is unlikely to bring an end to this bull run. At most, it may slightly slow down its pace.Note: CDD refers to Coin Days Destroyed, which assumes that each Bitcoin accumulates "1 coin day" every day. Holding 10 Bitcoins for 10 days accumulates 100 coin days. When these Bitcoins are

item.title: Bitcoin briefly drops below $118,000
item.description: On July 24th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin briefly fell below $118,000 and is currently trading at $118,013, with a 24-hour decrease of 0.71%.

item.title: Yesterday, the US Ethereum Spot ETF saw a net inflow of $332 million, while the Bitcoin Spot ETF experienced a net outflow for the third consecutive day.
item.description: On July 24th, based on Farside Investors' data, the net inflow of the US Ethereum spot ETF was $332 million yesterday.Yesterday, the net outflow of the US Bitcoin spot ETF was $85.8 million, indicating that it was the third consecutive day of net outflows.

item.title: A whale has once again withdrawn 76,000 SOL from Kraken, approximately $14.5 million.
item.description: On July 24th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, a whale has once again withdrawn 76,000 SOL from Kraken (approximately $14.5 million).Since July 8th, this whale has withdrawn a cumulative total of 164,000 SOL from Kraken (approximately $30.14 million) and has placed it in staking.

item.title: GSR withdrew 2708 ETH from Binance, approximately $9.87 million
item.description: On July 24th, as monitored by The Data Nerd, 2 hours prior to this, the liquidity provider GSR withdrew 2708 Ethereum (approximately $9.87 million) from Binance. Currently, the total balance of GSR's Ethereum holding wallet address may be 103,822 Ethereum (approximately $379 million).

item.title: Takashi Murakami to Launch Collectible NFT Trading Card Series 108 Flowers Revised on the Base Chain
item.description: July 24th: The highly renowned pop artist Takashi Murakami made an announcement on social media that his NFT series "108 Flowers Revised", which was inspired by his physical art collection, will be officially launched during the Onchain Summer event. This series is now on the blockchain, and users can directly mint it through the Base app.The minting process will officially commence at 9 a.m. in Japanese Standard Time on August 1st (5 p.m. in Pacific Time on July 31st).
